## SliderComponent.setInstant() method

**Signature:**

```typescript
setInstant(instant: boolean): this;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter            | Type                 | Description                                                              |
| -------------------- | -------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------ |
| <code>instant</code> | <code>boolean</code> | whether or not the value should get updated while the slider is dragging |

**Returns:**

`this`
